property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Default category for otherwise uncategorized features

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Version: BLOBKITVERSION Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.help,com.aptana.ide.snippets,com.aptana.ide.samples,com.aptana.ide.core,com.aptana.ide.core.ui,com.aptana.ide.documentation,com.aptana.ide.editor.js Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: com.tvblob.blobkit;singleton:=true Bundle-Name: Aptana Support for BLOBkit Bundle-Localization: plugin Bundle-Vendor: TVBLOB Srl
